So does this make sense with blur and animation:

```Home page item:
- Enable blur (on / off)

Functionality:
BLUR ON: Wallpaper is blurred - double tap to unblur temporarily, and after a few seconds, reblur
IF ANIMATED: do nothing on visibility, on doubletap, play back after unblur, revert to first frame and reblur

BLUR OFF: Wallpaper is unblurred - double tap has no effect on blur
IF ANIMATED: play back on visibility, remain on last frame. replay on doubletap
```
^^^ that goes against Adam's previous preference to play back animated while blurred, but that seems...goofy?
yeah it does
seem goofy
Regardless of technical complexity, it just seems like it will look stupid
So given that, above looks good? <@U026PHQ3J>?
